title: Opulence OP2 Watch Face
summary: Opulence OP2 Watch Face Clean and customizable
developerAddress: 2036 avenue  de la salle, Montreal, Quebec, Canada, H1V 2K5
description: YOU NEED TO INSTALL WATCHMAKER PREMIUM TO USE THIS WATCH FACE Download it here: http://goo.gl/FMxUfYFeatures:21 changeable colorsClean and crisp original designInvert ModeDimmed modeDual time 3 time zonesDay, dateWind direction and speed in Knot, Mph or Km/hWatch and phone battery levelsNext 12h calendar on the dial ring.Animated Transitions.Usage:Tap between 4 and 5 o'clock to cycle 21 colorsTap between 7 and 8 o'clock to InvertTap between 10 and 11 o'clock to cycle time zonesTap between 1 and 2 o'clock to update weather infoTap the Opulence logo to make hands translucideTap on the battery indicators to cycle ring mode.More to come...For Android Wear
descriptionHTML:
YOU NEED TO INSTALL WATCHMAKER PREMIUM TO USE THIS WATCH FACE Download it here: http://goo.gl/FMxUfY

Features:
21 changeable colors
Clean and crisp original design
Invert Mode
Dimmed mode
Dual time 3 time zones
Day, date
Wind direction and speed in Knot, Mph or Km/h
Watch and phone battery levels
Next 12h calendar on the dial ring.
Animated Transitions.

Usage:
Tap between 4 and 5 o'clock to cycle 21 colors
Tap between 7 and 8 o'clock to Invert
Tap between 10 and 11 o'clock to cycle time zones
Tap between 1 and 2 o'clock to update weather info
Tap the Opulence logo to make hands translucide
Tap on the battery indicators to cycle ring mode.

More to come...

For Android Wear
comments: best analog for square watch face i've seen. good functionality, but is quite the memory hog (not sure if this is watchmaker's fault or the face itself) and  I have to switch to a stock watch face before running multiple apps simultaneously (ie. Fit and Music) otherwise I get crashes on one or more of these apps.

Another great watch face! As everyone has said, BEAUTIFUL and simple watchface with great options to change without the need of of opening a phone app.  **Thanks for the quick response and great work you have done on this watch face! **
Not finding... Can't see the face in my watch nor Android Wear app face selection.  LG G watch
Change time zones I know how to select each of the time zones but how do you change the info for each time zone?
Love the white and black color options!
recentChanges: New code that make it smoother and more stable
Fix for date localized german language
